column5: Well I broke down and picked up myself a Curado 300DSV today, hopefully I can get out on Saturday and burn some bucktails to see how it does. Someday will come that Peacock bass trip!
It always feels good to get good/new gear! Catch a biggun'!
Well hopefully I get to use it this weekend!!!  Pretty soon I won't need any gear.  Who are we kidding I barely need to now!!!

I've heard bad reports about those things! Apparently they explode for no apparent reason!!!  I Think you should ship it on down to me and let me do a safety check for ya before you hurt yourself with it!
You'll love it.  So nice I might have to get another.
Green.....I will work on that;-)  It's just a used reel after the 58 incher I know of on Geo Bay! Its yours if I land her!
I copied and saved this yanno!
